Chance favors the connected mind.
No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world”
The great enemy of truth is very often not the lie-deliberate, contrived and dishonest--but the myth--persistent, persuasive and unrealistic
We think good ideas to death, when we should be acting them to life.
The only people in the world who can change things are those who can sell ideas
But if you have an idea and I have an idea and we exchange these ideas, then each of us will have two ideas.
If you have an apple and I have an apple and we exchange these apples then you and I will still each have one apple.
Human history is, in essence, a history of ideas
An idea not coupled with action will never get any bigger than the brain cell it occupied. cc: @jeffersonsackey @ameyaw112

New ideas pass through 3 periods
It can’t be done. 
It probably can be done but it’s not worth doing 
I knew it was a good idea all along!
The ability to convert ideas to things is the secret of outward success
on one’s ideas, to take a calculated risk – and to act
Often the difference between a successful person and a failure is not one has better abilities or ideas, but the courage that one has to bet
Good ideas are common – what’s uncommon are people who’ll work hard enough to bring them about.

A word to the unwise.
Torch every book.
Char every page.
Burn every word to ash.
Ideas are incombustible.
And therein lies your real fear

“Integrity is the ability to stand by an idea.” 
― Ayn Rand
No army can withstand the strength of an idea whose time has come.
An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
Ideas are easy. It's the execution of ideas that really separates the sheep from the goats.
